name: Regular Hand
description:
In this game, you're just a normal guy with a regular hand.

Do normal tasks just like most regular people do, like:

  • Wake up in the morning
  • Work at your amazing job
  • Eat 3 meals a day
  • Do some self-reflection
  • ...and maybe some other things?

This game was made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam with the theme: Out of Control. It was made in 48 hours, and everything in the game is by me. All audio is from https://freesound.org/ .
